channel.title: Apologies for the raft of spam messages
channel.description:
Sorry about the raft of spam messages over the last few days. We're working to eliminate this.
If anyone has any previous experience of eliminating spam on a Discourse platform, please get in touch!
Thanks
John

item.title: Apologies for the raft of spam messages
item.dc:creator: codinghorror
item.description:
You can contact us at team@discourse.org with specifics.

Read full topic
item.source: Apologies for the raft of spam messages

item.title: Apologies for the raft of spam messages
item.dc:creator: JohnAdams
item.description:
OK, I’ve stopped the site accepting new user registrations, at least to stem the flow of annoying spam. Will have another look at the settings to see what we can do to turn new user registrations back on again.

Read full topic
item.source: Apologies for the raft of spam messages
